comments:
From the "Mylar" preference page:
Select a one of the colour cells, activating the editor then click somewhere
else to deactivate it.  The following exception is logged and a dialog pops up.
 ColorCellEditor can return null when no colour has been selected.  One option
is to set the value on selection change, the other is to catch the null value.
